text: The washing machine is STILL B0RKEN after 10 days and the repair persons learned that Samsung no longer manufactures the display of the washing machine
You can steal the one from our fridge.
alas, this is a vintage 2009 samsung which is a smaller, non-touchscreen display
"I like the Samsungs, there's a lot of things they do that are nice, but when it comes to repairing 'em, there aren't many boards in town" -- repair guy
With a 2+ week wait for the one part that is available, the decision has been made to get rid of the Samsung stack and buy new laundry appliances.
I personally really like our not smart LG washer dryer stack.
My house comes with idiot appliances and I am so stoked
love my fisher & paykel topload washer/dryer. washer sounds like a helicopter is in the house tho.
